meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.value: Remove "ADOBE PDF" build if not required for your MC

para.text: The signal light is removed during shipping and needs to be remounted.

li.text: Connect the cable [3] to the signal light according to the pin label.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-23px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:15px; margin-left:71px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:123px left,123px left ;
li.text: Mount the signal light [1] to the splash guard and secure the pole mount [2].

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:123px left,123px left ;
para.text: This completes the installation of the signal light.
